descriptions: 010011110110111001100101 is a unique, large and berserk Securitron found in the Securitron de-construction plant, acting as one of the robotic mini-bosses at Big MT in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Old World Blues.
It is armed with a pair of shoulder-mounted missile launchers and displays the same distorted face seen on the other berserk Securitrons in the Big MT.
010011110110111001100101 appears only in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Old World Blues.
